name: Memenstein 3D
description:
A ray-cast based pseudo 3D game, based off Wolfenstein 3D and Call of Duty zombies. See what round you can get too, before a rogue planet collides with Earth and destroys everything in  existence.

Controls:

W-A-S-D (Movement)

Mouse (Camera)

2nd Mouse Button (Aim)

Primary Mouse Button (Shoot)

X (Sprint)

2-3 (Knife/Gun)

Details:

3D ray-cast engine based off Griffpatch's engine via Scratch, and packaged with TurboWarp. All other assets/code are made by me.

 I've been working on this now and then for a little over a year now, I've never expected it to come out this well, and I will even say I am proud of this little project. 

The game will be free, for now.  I have motivation to work on it further, but I feel it can be heightened for one, and for two, I need to be able to pay rent.

Minimum Requirements:

If the game is too laggy, hit the '0' key and lower the render resolution. Press '1' to close.

Integrated Graphics (AMD or Intel)

2GB Ram

91MB Storage Space.
